20101215154257.250|20101215154258.500|CCO|WEATHER?
20101215154258.500|20101215154259.750|CCO|>> WELL, IT'S WHERE THE CAR 
20101215154259.750|20101215154301.000|CCO|MEETS THE ROAD.
20101215154301.000|20101215154302.429|CCO|AND THAT REALLY IS THE TIRES.
20101215154302.429|20101215154303.857|CCO|YOU NEED TO MAKE SURE THAT YOUR 
20101215154303.857|20101215154305.286|CCO|TIRES HAVE PLENTY OF TREAD ON 
20101215154305.286|20101215154306.714|CCO|THEM.
20101215154306.714|20101215154308.143|CCO|WE USE A QUARTER.
20101215154308.143|20101215154309.571|CCO|IF YOU CAN SEE THE TOP OF 
20101215154309.571|20101215154311.000|CCO|GEORGE'S HEAD, THEN THOSE TIRES 
20101215154311.000|20101215154312.429|CCO|NEED TO BE REPLACED.
20101215154312.429|20101215154313.857|CCO|ALSO, TIRE PRESSURE ARE VERY 
20101215154313.857|20101215154315.286|CCO|IMPORTANT.
20101215154315.286|20101215154316.714|CCO|ALWAYS CHECK YOUR TIRE PRESSURES
20101215154316.714|20101215154318.143|CCO|BECAUSE COLD TEMPERATURES 
20101215154318.143|20101215154319.571|CCO|REDUCES THE PRESSURE INSIDE THE 
20101215154319.571|20101215154321.000|CCO|TIRE.
20101215154321.000|20101215154322.667|CCO|YOU NEED TO KEEP THOSE UP TO 
20101215154322.667|20101215154324.333|CCO|DATE, AS WELL.
20101215154324.333|20101215154326.000|CCO|AND IF -- IF THE GOING REALLY 
20101215154326.000|20101215154327.667|CCO|GETS TOUGH, SNOW TIRES ARE 
20101215154327.667|20101215154329.333|CCO|REALLY GOOD CHOICE IF YOU ARE 
20101215154329.333|20101215154331.000|CCO|DRIVING IN SNOW AND ICE 
20101215154331.000|20101215154333.500|CCO|CONDITIONS, THEY HAVE A MUCH 
20101215154333.500|20101215154336.000|CCO|MORE AGGRESSIVE TREAD THAN A 
20101215154336.000|20101215154338.500|CCO|NORMAL ALL-SEASON TIRE AND GIVES

20101215154341.000|20101215154342.250|CCO|GOING, BETTER BRAKING AND 
20101215154342.250|20101215154343.500|CCO|CORNERING. 
20101215154343.500|20101215154344.750|CCO|>> SPEAKING OF BRAKING AND 
20101215154344.750|20101215154346.000|CCO|CORNERING, SOME COMMON SENSE 
20101215154346.000|20101215154347.250|CCO|APPLIES, AS WELL, IN TERMS OF 
20101215154347.250|20101215154348.500|CCO|BEING ON THE ROADS.
